abstract: The New York Times hockey writers Jeff Z. Klein and Christopher Botta discuss talk about the Rangers, whose season opens Friday in Stockholm against the Los Angeles Kings.
snippet: The New York Times hockey writers Jeff Z. Klein and Christopher Botta discuss talk about the Rangers, whose season opens Friday in Stockholm against the Los Angeles Kings.
lead_paragraph: In the second installment of our season preview conversations, Jeff Z. Klein and Christopher Botta discuss the Rangers, whose season opens Friday in Stockholm against the Los Angeles Kings.

headline.main: 2-on-1: Are Rangers Stanley Cup Contenders, or Just a Good Hockey Club?
